item.title: Bessent says U.S. has 'lots' of options to use on tariffs if it loses Supreme Court case
item.description: The high court it set Wednesday to hear arguments on whether Trump exceeded his authority to enact sweeping duties on U.S. trading partners.

item.title: AI-washing and the massive layoffs hitting the economy
item.description: Amazon, Target and UPS are laying off thousands of employees, but the reasons behind the cuts go a lot deeper than AI.

item.title: Russia looks to cosy up with China after Trumpâ€™s meeting with Xi
item.description: Russian officials appeared eager to reafiirm Moscow's alliance with China following President Donald Trump's meeting with Xi Jinping last week.

item.title: Tariffs are expected to start showing up more in consumer prices as holiday shopping season starts
item.description: Impacts have been muted so far as companies built up inventories ahead of the duties and have absorbed some of the impact.

item.title: Trump cuts fentanyl tariffs on China to 10% as Beijing delays latest rare earths curbs by a year
item.description: Trump said he will be going to China in April, followed by a trip by Xi to the U.S. without specifying a timeline.
